Phase18Description: Asa and I chased a bandit into caverns beneath the oasis. We must put a stop to whatever it is they are doing here.
Callback17Header: Enter the Tunnels Beneath the Oasis
Callback27Header: Speak with Asa at the oasis' shore
Phase0Description: Something is polluting the Iron Wolves' water supplies. Haddad asked that I meet up with Asa to determine the cause.
Toast: The Iron Wolves' water supply has been poisoned.
Name: More Value Than Gold
